name: Storm O.S.
description:
Master Hong is dead. Now you, the android, are free to solve the mysteries of the ancient Storm Operating System. 

A short game by Kapricorn Media. Created for Ludum Dare 36 Jam in 72 hours.

Music by Massimo Pericolo ( Soundcloud - Massimo Pericolo ) 

Original Ludum Dare entry

Best played in fullscreen mode, 1920x1080
